name: Emergency Vehicles Car Parking
description:
=================
*** $0.99 -> $0.00! ***
=================

PLAY NOW>>>>>>>>>>>

Become a city rescue worker! Help ambulances, firetrucks and police cars get to their destination on time by carefully selecting roads, switching levers on time and placing them in appropriate garages. All levels in our game are free including all of the cool vehicles!

Every car has a distinctive color. Quickly move them around the city to the same colored garage, keeping in mind the switches on the way.

But wait, it’s not as easy as it sounds. Other emergency vehicles need to use the roads too so be sure to be quick in parking before they crash into each other.

As the game progresses, the difficulty also increases. It’s a fun, challenging game that’s sure to entertain you for hours. Avoid chaos in the city by making sure that the emergency vehicles go to the right parking spots because if they don’t, the game goes back to zero and you have to start all over again.

Are you ready? Download this game today and play away!

*** Game Features***

• Super Exciting Game
• Realistic Environment
• Easy Controls
• Great Graphics
• Guaranteed Hours of Fun

=======================
*** DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE ***
=======================
